Pandemic overview

Table of Contents

Aims

This links various pandemic related things on this site. Some are pages and some are blog posts (e.g. graphs of pandemic related data).

Pages & posts

  • Scientific papers - ones that seem either informative or note-worthy
  • Risk appetite and public health - quite a lot of the interpersonal tension would seem to be from people not recognising different risk appetites and what public health is.
  • Age standardised mortality rate by vaccination status - while needing careful (and uncertain) interpretation these figures do rebut the idea that the vaccine has any negative effects that override the advantages seen by some groups (the highly vaccinated are more likely to have high socioeconomic privilege and listen to doctors - vaccination does not undo the advantages those things can bring).
This is a fork (of Jekyll Netlify Boilerplate that is maintained by Dan Urbanowicz).
